reviewText: This is a pretty good story about a student who falls in love withhis music teacher. This is an import from Europe and has a decent dubjob. Carroll Baker plays the music teacher who is being blackmailedby one student with nude photographs of her. Another student fallsin love with her and she teaches him the ways of love. This film isa nice piece of erotica with nudity but does not come across as beingsleazy.
summary: Nice take on the older woman

reviewText: Coming of age story of 18 year old Italian boy. His girlfriend keeps complaining thathe isn't affectionate enough. She keeps dropping hints, but he doesn't know what to do. It's a long story, but his piano teacher (Carol Baker) shows him how to do it and the next day he and his girl do it. Amazingly erotic even though the sex scenes don't show all that much. Carol Baker is American, but she speaks Italian. Dubbing into English is good. Sound is curiously muted but audible. The Italian track sounds the same.
summary: Amazingly erotic coming of age story
